SELECT aa.AddressId , aa.PostNo , aa.ZoneNo , aa.Address1 , aa.Address2 , aa.CreateDate , aa.CreateBy , u1.UserName as CreateByName , aa.UpdateDate , aa.UpdateBy , u2.UserName as UpdateName FROM BCAddress aa with (nolock) LEFT JOIN AAUser u1 with (nolock) ON aa.CreateBy = u1.UserId LEFT JOIN AAUser u2 with (nolock) ON aa.UpdateBy = u2.UserId WHERE 1=1
AND ( aa.PostNo LIKE #FindText# + '%' OR aa.ZoneNo LIKE #FindText# + '%' OR aa.Address1 LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR aa.Address2 LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND aa.AddressId = #AddressId#
ORDER BY aa.AddressId
statements.insert:

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ADDRESS_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UCD.ADDRESS SET POST_NO = #POST_NO# , ZONE_NO = #ZONE_NO# , ADDRESS1 = #ADDRESS1# , ADDRESS2 = #ADDRESS2# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ADDRESS_ID = #ADDRESS_ID#
